notFound.title: Product Not Found
notFound.message: The product you're looking for doesn't exist.

toast.selectSizeDesc: Choose a size before adding to cart

ingredientsIntro: Our products are made with carefully selected, high-quality ingredients:
ingredientsDisclaimer: * All ingredients are halal-certified and free from artificial preservatives, colors, and flavors.

feeding.note: For ages 4+ months. Feeding amounts may vary based on your cat's age, weight and activity level. Transition over 7–10 days for a smooth switch.
feeding.bullet1: Serve around 70–118 g per 1–2 kg body weight per day
feeding.bullet3: Adjust portions based on activity level

additionalAdvice.title: Additional Advice
additionalAdvice.waterDesc: Keep clean water available at all times for your cat.
additionalAdvice.gradualDesc: Transition over 7 days to avoid digestive discomfort.
additionalAdvice.packDesc: Multiple sizes available; choose the one that fits your feeding routine (about two weeks per pack for regular feeding).

chicken-premium.name: Premium Halal Chicken Cat Food
chicken-premium.description: Our premium halal chicken formula is specially crafted for cats who deserve the best. Made with 100% halal-certified chicken meat as the primary ingredient, this complete and balanced meal provides all the essential nutrients your feline friend needs. Rich in high-quality protein, omega-3 fatty acids, and essential vitamins, it supports healthy muscle development, a shiny coat, and overall vitality. Free from artificial preservatives, colors, and flavors.

tuna-premium.name: Premium Halal Tuna Cat Food
tuna-premium.description: Indulge your cat with our premium halal tuna formula, made with sustainably sourced, halal-certified tuna. This delicious recipe is packed with high-quality protein and essential fatty acids that cats naturally crave. Enhanced with omega-3 from fish oil, it promotes heart health, brain function, and a lustrous coat. Perfect for cats who prefer seafood flavors, this complete meal provides balanced nutrition without any artificial additives.

combo-chicken-tuna.name: Premium Halal Chicken & Tuna Combo
combo-chicken-tuna.description: The best of both worlds — our combo brings together premium halal chicken and tuna in one complete formula. Perfect for cats who love variety, this balanced blend offers high-quality protein from two premium sources, essential omega fatty acids, and full nutrition in every serving. 100% halal certified, no artificial additives.
